programme.title: FRA-BEL - Women's Semi-Final | Basketball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Women's Semi-Final took place at the Bercy Arena, France, on 09/08/24. France won this Game with a final score: FRA 81:75 BEL.

programme.title: USA-FRA - Men's Gold Medal Game | Basketball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Gold Medal Game took place at Bercy Arena, France, on 10/08/2024. The United States of America won the Gold with a final score: USA 98:87 FRA.

programme.title: The story of the basketball legend who never gave up on her Olympic dream
programme.desc: In “The Queen”, Brazilian legend Hortencia Marcari explains why she came out of retirement only months after giving birth.

programme.title: The Vault: Matthias Steiner, Olympic timekeeping, Sky Brown, Dream Team
programme.desc: Weightlifting legend Matthias Steiner comes to The Vault to share his incredible stories and discover his kit on display at the Olympic Museum for the first time. Sky Brown who donated her skateboard shares her emotion in winning a medal at Tokyo 2020. Jeannette discovers the magic eye camera from London 1948 while Rob finds Michael Jordan’s iconic shoes from Barcelona 1992 which leads him to an unexpected “other dream team” story linking the Olympic and the Grateful Dead.

programme.title: SRB-GER - Men's Bronze Medal Game | Basketball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Bronze Medal Game took place at Bercy Arena, France, on 10/08/2024. Serbia won the Bronze with a final score SRB 93:83 GER.

programme.title: Olympic Outposts -Episode 1: A global journey to discover sports passions in the most unlikely places.
programme.desc: Journey to the opposite ends of the world as our hosts explore the basketball fever in Philippines, American football in the heart of Germany or the unlikely Ice hockey tradition in Australia.

programme.title: GER-FRA - Women's Quarter-Final | Basketball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Game between Germany and France took place at the Bercy Arena, France, on 07/08/24. Final score FRA 84:71 GER.

programme.title: The Golden Generation | Five Rings Films
programme.desc: How a once-in-a-generation Argentina men's basketball team, led by Manu Ginobili, brought down the USA “Dream Team” and won the gold at the Athens 2004 Olympic Games.

programme.title: FRA-GER - Men's Semi-Final | Basketball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Semi-Final match between France and Germany took place at the Bercy Arena on 08/08/24. Final Score FRA 73:69 GER.

programme.desc: This Women's Semi-Final took place at the Bercy Arena, France, on 09/08/24. The United States of America won this Game with a final score: USA 85:64 AUS.

programme.title: Can NBA and Dream Team star Laettner teach this team to win?
programme.desc: Team USA and NBA legend Christian Laettner shows the Garinger High School varsity basketball team how they can improve their game.

programme.desc: This Men's Bronze Medal Match took place at La Concorde 1, Paris, on 05/08/2024. Lithuania won the Bronze with a final score of LTU 21:18 LAT.

programme.desc: This Bronze Medal Match took place at La Concorde 1, Paris, on 05/08/2024. The United States of America won the Bronze with a final score of USA 16:13 CAN.

programme.desc: The Game between Spain and Belgium took place at the Bercy Arena, France, on 07/08/24. Final score BEL 79:66 ESP.

programme.desc: The match between Germany and Spain took place at La Concorde 1, Paris, on the 05/08/24. Final score GER 17:16 ESP.

programme.desc: Round 2 of the Men and Women's Surfing Heats at Teahupo'o, Tahiti, on the 28/07/24

programme.title: An Se Young (KOR) v He Bing Jiao (CHN) - Women's Singles Gold Medal Match | Badminton | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Women's Singles Gold Medal match between An Se Young (KOR) v He Bing Jiao (CHN) which took place at the Porte de La Chapelle Arena on 05/08/24. An Se Young (KOR) won the match with a final score of 2:0.
The medal ceremony saw An Se Young (KOR) take Gold, He Bing Jiao (CHN) take Silver and Gregoria Tunjung (INA) take the Bronze medal.

programme.title: Viktor Axelsen (DEN) v Kunlavut Vitidsarn (THA) - Men's Singles Gold Medal Match | Badminton | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: Viktor Axelsen (DEN) won the Men's Singles Gold Medal against Kunlavut Vitidsarn (THA), with a score of 2:0, which took place at La Chapelle Arena on 05/08/24

programme.title: Mixed Team Skeet Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Mixed Team Shooting Skeet Finals were held on 05/08/2024 at Chateauroux Shooting Centre, Paris. Italy claimed Gold, United States Silver and China completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's Parallel Bars, Women's Balance Beam, Men's Horizontal Bar, Women's Floor | Artistic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Artistic Gymnastics session took place at the Bercy Arena, France, on 05/08/2024. It includes the Finals for Men's Parallel Bars, Women's Balance Beam, Men's Horizontal Bar and Women's Floor.

programme.title: Women's & Men's Kayak Cross Finals | Canoe Slalom | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session includes the Women's & Men's Kayak Cross Finals. The races took place at Nautical St. White Water, Paris, on 05/08/24.
In Men's Kayak Finn Butcher (NZL) won the Gold medal, Joseph Clarke (GBR) Silver and Noah Hegge (GER) completed the podium.
In Women's Kayak Noemie Fox (AUS) won Gold, Angele Hug (FRA) Silver and Kimberley Woods (GBR) Bronze.
